alert.note: Alert for Frio; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:17AM CDT until June 03 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN MEDINA AND FRIO COUNTIES... At 1217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Frio Town, or 12 miles northwest of Pearsall, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pearsall, Devine, Dilley, Lytle, Natalia, North Pearsall, Moore, Derby, Hilltop, Bigfoot, Biry, Yancey, Divot, Bluff, Frio Town, Schattel and Three Oaks. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
